content: Add HTML parse to poetry block
Upgraded node version to 22.19, React to 19.1.1, Next JS to 15.5.2
Improved UI on articles which is missing series / tags / subtitle
Forced date display from user's locale to universally identical time zone (UTC -5)
Upgraded node version to 18.x
Fixed Article Catalog page pagination calculation bug.
Added poetry display block for Article page.
Changed article tags storage.
Enhanced security and coding practices by removing sensitive data from source code.
Optimized code structure. Fixed page heading font problem. Added icons next to page heading. Optimized small devices UI/UX.
Fixed articles catalog page's pagination bugs when using filters again. Updated about page content.
Fixed articles catalog page's pagination bugs when using filters.
Optimized number display in financial dashboard.
Fixed list item font problems.
Redesigned home page, added masonry style of architecture diagrams. Showed page heading for non-laptop devices.
Fixed articles catalog page's pagination bugs.
Added Q&A page.
Added filtering by tag function and a button to remove filtering on article catalog page.
Showed article series on article catalog page.
Added tag function on article catalog page.
Added floating action button, removed drawer and appbar for small devices. Added security http response headers. Adapted responsive fonts size.

The blog debuted. Functions included: article catalog page, article page, changelog page, contributors page, about page, home page with system architecture diagram, login page, personal finance dashboard (login needed)
Started to write program.
Prepared neccessary technical knowledge.
Generated basic bluebrint and idea.
